description: Engineered for maximum performance in wet climes, this lightweight marsh coat is constructed with a three-layer, water-repellent shell and fully seam-sealed at the interior. It is also made with recycled polyester, reinforcing Ralph Lauren's aim to create the highest-quality products while considering our environment.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 38" front body length, a 40.5" back body length, a 21.5" shoulder, a 51" chest, and a 36" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 0.75" between sizes.
Drawstring stowaway hood with a built-in brim, an adjustable drawcord at the back, and reflective trim. Mockneck. Full-zip front. Snapped storm placket.
Long sleeves. Adjustable hook-and-loop cuff tabs. Right sleeve zip-and-flap pocket. Rubber "RLX" tab at each elbow. Leather-trimmed "RLX Ralph Lauren" plaque at the left sleeve.
Two chest zip-and-snap pockets. Two front waist buttoned pockets.
Drawstring waist with leather stoppers. Fishtail hem. Unlined. Fully seam-sealed at the interior.
This product is made with recycled polyester. By turning industrial and post-consumer polyester waste into new product, we are reducing our dependence on virgin petroleum-based material.
Shell: 100% recycled polyester. Drawcord tunnel: 100% nylon. Trim: 100% cow leather. Machine washable. Imported.
Visit corporate.RalphLauren.com/citizenship-create-timeless-style for more information on Ralph Lauren's sustainability initiatives.
Model is 6'1" (185 cm) and wears a size medium.
